imdb.plot outline: The story is of Anzela, who is in love with Sanwal. But her brother Khalid and sister in law Shaista may her with Zawaar. On wedding night, he I'd poisoned by Shajee and Jalal but Sana thinks she is the murderer as she also gave him poison. Next day, Zawaar doesn't awake up and doctors feel sorry for him. Sarwat, Zawaar's mother confess in high shock and beats Anzela as she thinks she is the real murderer of her son. While, Sanwal convinces his mother burr she doesn't agree, so he comes to his home and the Noor Bano (Naima Khan), very close to Anzela feels him that sheer is married and at night get husband was poisoned. Sarwat acts as she had forgiven Anzela in front of Shaista and Khalid. She this that Anzela have poison to hey soon because she used to love another guy and asks all people that she will give them what they want if they answer. While Zubia and Hammad, children of Khalid and Shaista come with their parents and assure safety of Anzela and sat that they are going to Dubai because Khalod has got new job. Sarwat behaves maid to Anzela but Anzela accepts all tragedies done on her. Including her first sister in law Hafsa, Zawaar's sister treats Anzela maid because she also thinks that Anzela is real culprit. Hafsa loves her college friend Zain but her mother doesn't allow her to marry as he week again kill Hafsa like Anzela. On first day of his coming, his mother doubts that he is Anzela's lover but Hafsa confronts her and slaps Anzela for being in love. But she says she hasn't even killed her brother but no one believes her. Sanwal comes in new phase of Ramis only to protect Anzela add the teacher of Hafsa but all things get opened that Sarwat again slaps Anzela for being in love with Ramis. He also helps Zain and Hafsa being married, only if Hafsa mattress him with Anzela. But she refuses, but he still jobs both. Shajee, Zawaar's foster brother whom Hafsa thinks her brother starts liking Anzela but no one understands that is she telling lie or not. Noor Bano helps her as she starts living in their home and is given permission by Sarwat. It is further revealed that Zawaar is Sarwat's son by her first husband Behroze and that her father created problems between them. And Hafsa and Shajee are not siblings of Zawaar and she that's why cares if Behrize's gift of Zawaar. Sana's friend Sabreen had also helped Shajee only because he promised to marry her. Sarwat listens and dies in shock. Finally all leaf happy life and Shajee and Jalal are executed.
